attributes.action: Assign personal allowance for a women at retirement age to take advantage of higher personal allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The higher personal allowance for a person of retirement age starts when the person becomes 65. This is the retirement age of men. Why is there not an inreased allowance when a woman reaches retirement age of 60? Such can be seen as sexual discrimination and needs to be addressed
